tasks.label: Run Hunter Testing Initial Locomotion
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:0 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/train_agent.py +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion +domain_rand=NO_domain_rand +rewards=loco/reward_hunter_locomotion +robot=hunter/hunter +terrain=terrain_locomotion_plane +obs=loco/leggedloco_obs_singlestep_withlinvel num_envs=16 project_name=TestInitialLoco experiment_name=Hunter_loco_IsaacSim headless=False" &

tasks.label: Full Training Hunter Headless
tasks.command: nohup bash -ic "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/train_agent.py +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion +domain_rand=NO_domain_rand +rewards=loco/reward_hunter_locomotion +robot=hunter/hunter +terrain=terrain_locomotion_plane +obs=loco/leggedloco_obs_singlestep_withlinvel num_envs=4096 project_name=FullTrainingHunter experiment_name=FullTrainingHunter headless=True" > full_training_hunter.log 2>&1 &

tasks.label: Evaluate Hunter Locomotion Model with Pseudo-Random Lateral Pushes
Evaluate Hunter - Forward Locomotion Scenario
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:0 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.XAUTHORITY xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/eval_agent.py +checkpoint=logs/FullTrainingHunter/20250715_134736-FullTrainingHunter-locomotion-hunter/model_83000.pt +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion ++env.config.max_episode_length_s=60 +env.config.locomotion_command_ranges.lin_vel_x=[0.5,0.5] +env.config.locomotion_command_ranges.lin_vel_y=[0.0,0.0] +env.config.locomotion_command_ranges.ang_vel_yaw=[0.0,0.0] ++env.config.locomotion_command_resampling_time=1000.0 > eval.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: Evaluate Hunter - Backward Locomotion Scenario
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:0 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/eval_agent.py +checkpoint=logs/FullTrainingHunter/20250715_134736-FullTrainingHunter-locomotion-hunter/model_83000.pt +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion ++env.config.max_episode_length_s=60 +env.config.locomotion_command_ranges.lin_vel_x=[-0.5,-0.5] +env.config.locomotion_command_ranges.lin_vel_y=[0.0,0.0] +env.config.locomotion_command_ranges.ang_vel_yaw=[0.0,0.0] ++env.config.locomotion_command_resampling_time=1000.0 > eval.log 2>&1" &

tasks.command: DISPLAY=:0 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/eval_agent.py +checkpoint=logs/FullTrainingHunter/20250715_134736-FullTrainingHunter-locomotion-hunter/model_83000.pt +simulator=isaacsim ++env.config.max_episode_length_s=10000 ++env.config.locomotion_command_resampling_time=10000 > eval.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: Run Hunter Testing Initial Locomotion Tilled Soil
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:0 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate isaaclab && python ${workspaceFolder}/humanoidverse/train_agent.py +simulator=isaacsim +exp=locomotion +domain_rand=NO_domain_rand +rewards=loco/reward_hunter_locomotion +robot=hunter/hunter +terrain=terrain_tilled_soil +obs=loco/leggedloco_obs_singlestep_withlinvel num_envs=16 project_name=TestInitialLocoTilledSoil experiment_name=Hunter_loco_IsaacSim_TilledSoil headless=False > train.log 2>&1" &
